text: Besides having stellar music, I'm also impressed by the quality of The Dark Spire's writing. I love the subtle silliness that you find everywhere in the dialogue and descriptions.
author: Blois Fulcher

text: Love this game. I had to get in imported from the Usa since they haven't released it in the UK

text:
This game has a Classic mode that you can switch anytime you want. The graphics, music etc. are all remade 8-bit style. It's really cool.

BTW, I'll be uploading the Uncharted 2 OST today, a bit like I did with Final Fantasy IV DS, so get ready for a spam of 20 songs at some point.
author: SupraDarky
